item.title: Tech2
item.description: Tech 2 This is the second page of the website.

item.title: 1. Technologies I Learned for LFX
item.description: Why Me As soon as I applied for LFX Mentorship with this project, I started learning the technologies I will need for this project. I stated with Golang since I thought that in order to understand Hugo, I first need to learn Golang. Then I learned Hugo through documentations. I made few projects on Hugo and then started learning Figma.

item.title: 2. Why should select me
item.description: Why Me As soon as I applied for LFX Mentorship with this project, I started learning the technologies I will need for this project. I stated with Golang since I thought that in order to understand Hugo, I first need to learn Golang. Then I learned Hugo through documentations.
